headline.main: DIET AND ARTERIES; Heart Association Unit Suggests Some Cut in Cholesterol Intake

docs.abstract: W L Laurence on Amer Heart Assn com recommendations of cut in fat intake in diet
docs.lead_paragraph: Diseases of the heart and the blood vessels are the primary cause of death in the United States. More than 90 per cent of the deaths from these diseases are caused by hardening of the arteries (arteriosclerosis) and high blood pressure (hypertension)
docs.snippet: Diseases of the heart and the blood vessels are the primary cause of death in the United States. More than 90 per cent of the deaths from these diseases are caused by hardening of the arteries (arteriosclerosis) and high blood pressure (hypertension)
